<div class="divhome">
I am a third-year PhD candidate at the <a target="_blank" href="https://www.parisschoolofeconomics.eu/en/gethin-amory/">Paris School of Economics</a>.
</div>

<div class="divhome">
This academic year, I am a visiting student at UC Berkeley. I was a visiting student at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and at Harvard University in 2021-2022.
</div>

<div class="divhome">
My research focuses on topics related to poverty, inequality, and political conflict. I co-created the <a target="_blank" href="https://wpid.world/">World Political Cleavages and Inequality Database</a>. I also contribute to the <a target="_blank" href="https://wid.world/">World Inequality Database</a> project as a World Inequality Lab fellow.
</div>
